attributes.action: Deport all asylum seekers that have broken the law
attributes.additional_details: We think the solution is simple and they should be deported.
attributes.background: We think that by breaking the law, they prove that they are of a criminal mindset & allowing them to continue living in the UK may feed into their criminalistic mindset.
